metadata.name: 1920s Arkham Horror NPC Generator
metadata.author: Eldritch Designs
metadata.description: A comprehensive NPC generator for 1920s Lovecraftian horror TTRPGs. Creates investigators, witnesses, cultists, and everyday citizens of Arkham and beyond. All content is **system-agnostic** and focuses on narrative descriptions rather than mechanical statistics.
metadata.instructions:
Use the `npcComplete` template for a full NPC description. Individual tables can be rolled separately for specific details. The `npcCompact` template provides a briefer summary suitable for quick reference.

**Key Tables:**
- `npcComplete` - Full detailed NPC
- `npcCompact` - Brief NPC summary
- `profession` - 1920s occupations
- `darkSecret` - Mythos-related secrets
- `motivation` - Character drives

copyright.notice: This generator structure and content is released under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0

tables.name: Gender
tables.description: Character gender for 1920s setting

tables.name: Age Range
tables.description: Character age category with descriptive details

sets.ageDesc: in their late twenties to early thirties

sets.agePhysical: lines of experience around their eyes
deeply lined face and careful movements

tables.name: Social Class
tables.description: Economic and social standing in 1920s society

sets.housing: a stately manor or penthouse apartment
sets.income: substantial family wealth or lucrative profession

sets.housing: a comfortable townhouse or well-appointed apartment
a cramped apartment or boarding house

sets.socialCircle: others on the margins of society

tables.name: Primary Personality Trait
tables.description: The dominant aspect of the character's personality

sets.traitBehavior: constantly asking questions and investigating oddities
carefully considering every action before committing
focusing on what works rather than what's proper
showing genuine concern for others' suffering
putting others at ease with wit and grace
sets.traitRisk: may rely too heavily on social skills

sets.traitBehavior: finding creative solutions with limited means
breaking down problems into logical components

tables.name: Secondary Personality Trait
tables.description: A supporting aspect of the character's personality

sets.secondaryBehavior: often makes clever observations or jokes
acts on instinct rather than planning
draws strength from faith or belief
expects the worst from people and situations
believes in higher principles and better futures
shields others from harm or distress
always striving for advancement and recognition

tables.name: Virtue
tables.description: The character's greatest strength of character

sets.virtueBehavior: always tells the truth, even when difficult
stands by friends and principles no matter the cost
faces fears and dangers for the greater good
freely shares resources and time with those in need
waits calmly for the right moment
shows compassion even to those who may not deserve it
maintains optimism even in darkest times

tables.name: Character Flaw
tables.description: The character's greatest weakness or failing

sets.flawBehavior: refuses to admit mistakes or ask for help
cannot resist opportunities for wealth or power
flees or freezes when danger becomes real
responds to provocation with disproportionate anger
cannot let go of certain ideas or pursuits
lies even when the truth would serve better
cannot resist their vice (alcohol, gambling, laudanum, etc.)
sets.flawTrigger: stress or availability of their vice

sets.flawBehavior: takes unnecessary risks without considering consequences
trusts too easily and misses obvious deceptions
sets.flawTrigger: sob stories and appeals to emotion

sets.flawBehavior: holds grudges and dwells on past wrongs
sets.flawTrigger: reminders of past failures or betrayals

tables.name: Motivation
tables.description: What drives the character, particularly relevant to Mythos investigations

sets.motivationDesc: needs to understand the reality behind strange events
sets.motivationRisk: may pursue dangerous knowledge too far

sets.motivationDesc: seeks retribution against those who wronged them or their loved ones
determined to shield loved ones or innocents from harm
sets.motivationRisk: may be manipulated through threats to those they protect

sets.motivationDesc: trying to atone for past sins or mistakes
sets.motivationRisk: may take on impossible burdens out of guilt

sets.motivationDesc: bound by professional, religious, or personal obligation
sets.motivationRisk: may follow orders against their better judgment

sets.motivationDesc: driven by an insatiable need to know and understand
sets.motivationRisk: may read things that should stay unread

sets.motivationDesc: believes they serve a higher power against the darkness
sets.motivationRisk: may have their faith shattered by cosmic revelations

sets.motivationDesc: simply trying to stay alive in a world gone mad
sets.motivationRisk: may abandon others to save themselves

sets.motivationDesc: wants to leave something meaningful behind
sets.motivationRisk: may make rash decisions to secure their memory

sets.motivationDesc: acting out of devotion to another person
seeks to gain influence, knowledge, or supernatural abilities
sets.motivationRisk: may bargain with forces beyond comprehension

sets.motivationDesc: determined to see wrongdoers punished and victims vindicated
sets.motivationRisk: may become what they fight against

tables.name: Dark Secret
tables.description: A hidden connection to the Mythos or other dark past

sets.secretDesc: once saw something that defied all rational explanation
a loved one vanished under mysterious circumstances
once belonged to a cult worshipping something terrible
has read or learned something mortals were not meant to know
received a troubling inheritance from a deceased relative
sets.secretEffect: strange events have occurred since taking possession

sets.secretDesc: descends from a family with unnatural connections
barely escaped a deadly supernatural encounter
receives disturbing visions of things to come or things that are
sets.secretEffect: cannot tell if they are prophecy or madness

sets.secretDesc: their actions inadvertently caused terrible harm
sets.secretEffect: tormented by guilt and fear of discovery

sets.secretDesc: once struck a deal with something not of this world
sets.secretEffect: dreads the day payment comes due

sets.secretDesc: has lived a relatively normal life until now
sets.secretEffect: blissfully unaware of the true nature of reality

entries.value: a corpse rise and walk away from the morgue
a figure that cast no shadow in the moonlight
something massive moving beneath the harbor waters
a door open onto a place that couldn't exist
a person transform into something inhuman
lights in the sky that moved with terrible purpose
a ritual in the woods that summoned something
the stars arrange themselves into an impossible pattern
their own reflection move independently in a mirror
a painting whose subject changed when no one was looking
after investigating strange sounds in the basement
during a voyage that returned with an empty ship
following receipt of a letter with no return address
after purchasing an antique from a mysterious dealer
in the wake of recurring nightmares about a flooded city
after accepting an invitation to a private gathering
during an expedition to a remote location
following a bout of sleepwalking that grew increasingly severe
after claiming to have found something in an old book
witnessing a sacrifice that went wrong
realizing what they were truly worshipping
being chosen for an 'honor' they couldn't accept
a police raid that they barely survived
the leader's true nature was revealed
a moment of clarity during a ritual
discovering what happened to previous initiates
a moldering tome in a restricted library section
the dying words of a condemned man
a coded message in their family papers
patterns in astronomical data that should not exist
an antique mirror that shows reflections from other times
a key that fits no known lock
a painting whose subject seems to age
a music box that plays impossible harmonies
a journal written in an unknown language
a family estate with sealed rooms
jewelry that feels warm regardless of temperature
a collection of photographs showing impossible places
a town that drove their ancestors out
marriages to outsiders who came from the sea
a family curse dating back centuries
physical traits that skip generations but always return
a family home that no one will enter
a shipwreck on an island that wasn't on any chart
being trapped in a building during a summoning
an attack by something that shouldn't exist
a cave-in that revealed ancient chambers
a storm that brought things from the deep
a seance that contacted something terrible
an asylum where the inmates knew too much
a night in a house where time moved strangely
cities beneath the waves where beings still dwell
the spaces between stars where things wait
future catastrophes that may yet be prevented
the true faces of people they know
places of power that call to them
the moment of their own death
geometric shapes that hurt to remember
a throne in darkness and what sits upon it
releasing something that was safely contained
leading others into a trap they barely escaped
translating a text that drove someone mad
opening a door that should have stayed closed
speaking a name that should never be spoken
failing to heed warnings about a dangerous place
bringing an artifact back from an expedition
teaching someone knowledge that destroyed them
the life of someone they loved
answers to questions that haunted them
revenge upon those who wronged them
a service to be named later
to open a door when the stars are right
to bring others into the fold
their body as a vessel when summoned
to guard a location until released
to speak the final words of a ritual at their death

tables.name: Physical Build
tables.description: Character's body type and stature

sets.buildDetail: looking as though a strong wind might carry them away
with broad shoulders and thick limbs
carrying considerable weight on their frame
standing head and shoulders above most
commanding attention through sheer physical presence

tables.description: 1920s-appropriate men's hairstyles

cut very close to the scalp

sets.hairStyleDesc: cut in the daring new bobbed style

sets.featureLocation: as if they rarely see sunlight

dressed sharply in fashionable pinstripes
wearing somber clerical attire
dressed in clothing with a military cut, perhaps a veteran

dressed in worn, much-mended clothing

dressed flashily with expensive accessories

entries.value: a lab coat over ordinary clothes

sets.clothingDesc: wearing a stained laboratory coat

dressed conservatively in an older style
wearing a crisp nurse's uniform
dressed in somber mourning attire

a partner driven to an early grave

sets.sanityDesc: troubled by what they have seen

sets.sanityBehavior: responds to horrors with disturbing calm

tables.name: Connection to the Mythos
tables.description: The character's awareness of and involvement with cosmic horrors

sets.mythosDesc: has no idea of the true nature of reality
sets.mythosReaction: would likely dismiss any evidence as fantasy

sets.mythosDesc: has heard rumors but remains unconvinced
sets.mythosReaction: would investigate strange claims with scientific skepticism

sets.mythosDesc: has had one or more encounters with the unexplainable

sets.mythosReaction: either avoids involvement or grimly prepared

sets.mythosDesc: dedicates their life to fighting the Mythos
sets.mythosReaction: seeks out and confronts supernatural threats

sets.mythosDesc: has been changed by Mythos contact
sets.mythosReaction: no longer entirely human in outlook
works to advance their masters' plans

tables.name: Distinctive Mannerism
tables.description: A notable behavioral quirk or habit

sets.mannerismDesc: perpetually cleaning their spectacles or polishing a trinket
speaks with an unusual rhythm, pausing at odd moments

entries.value: always seems to be looking past you

sets.mannerismDesc: rarely makes direct eye contact, gazing at something behind you
unconsciously hums when anxious or thinking

entries.value: touches a specific item for comfort

sets.mannerismDesc: frequently touches {{comfortItem}} as if for reassurance
always clears their throat before saying anything important
accompanies speech with dramatic hand movements
sometimes laughs when the situation doesn't warrant it
speaks with unusual formality even in casual situations
invariably sits or stands near the door

tables.name: Speech Pattern
tables.description: How the character typically speaks

entries.value: speaks in a rapid, clipped manner

sets.speechDesc: talks quickly, as if time is always short
speaks slowly, choosing each word with care
peppers speech with jargon from their profession

speaks loudly enough to be heard across a room
employs vivid street language and slang
is almost painfully polite in all interactions
often leaves thoughts unfinished, as if distracted
struggles with a stammer, especially when nervous

tables.name: Profession
tables.description: 1920s-appropriate occupations with Arkham Horror flavor

sets.professionLocation: St. Mary's Hospital or private practice

sets.professionDesc: a dealer in antiques and rare items
sets.professionLocation: a dusty shop in the old quarter
Miskatonic University Library or Arkham Public Library
working from home or coffee houses

entries.value: a mission in the poor quarter

tables.name: Cultural Background
tables.description: Character's ethnic and cultural heritage, affecting name generation

entries.value: **Initiate**  Recently recruited, still learning the cult's secrets
**True Believer**  A devoted worshipper who attends all rituals
**Recruiter**  Responsible for bringing in new members
**Guard**  Protects cult gatherings and eliminates threats
**Scholar**  Studies forbidden texts and ritual procedures
**Acolyte**  Assists in rituals and tends to sacred objects
**Inner Circle**  One of the leader's trusted lieutenants
**Sleeper Agent**  Maintains normal life while awaiting activation
Strange symbols tattooed or scarred on hidden parts of the body
Eyes that occasionally seem to reflect light like an animal's
A persistent odor of brine and decay they cannot wash away
Occasional twitches and muttering in unknown languages
An unnatural pallor and sensitivity to bright light
Fingernails that have become thick and yellowed
Dreams of R'lyeh that they speak of in their sleep
A cold touch that makes others uncomfortable
Subtle webbing beginning to form between their fingers
An obsessive habit of drawing certain geometric patterns
Attends midnight rituals in the old warehouse district
Helps dispose of evidence after cult 'ceremonies'
Procures sacrificial materials through their profession
Scouts potential victims or new members
Maintains a hidden shrine in their home
Creates forgeries to cover cult activities
Provides inside information about local authorities
Guards a location important to the cult's plans
Works to corrupt or recruit specific targets
**Desperate to talk**  Has been waiting for someone who will believe them
**Reluctant but persuadable**  Fears being thought insane but needs to unburden
**Terrified into silence**  Has been threatened or is too scared to speak
**In denial**  Insists they saw nothing, clearly lying
**Eager to help**  Wants answers and will cooperate fully
**Suspicious of investigators**  Worried about being blamed or committed
**Memory is fragmentary**  Genuinely confused about what they saw
**Will only talk for price**  Wants money, protection, or something else first
To be believed and taken seriously
Assurance that they aren't going mad

templates.name: Full Name
templates.description: Generates a culturally appropriate full name based on gender and background

templates.name: Physical Description
templates.pattern: A {{$build}} {{switch[$gender=="male":man].else[woman]}} {{$age.@ageDesc}} with {{$hairColor.@hairColorDesc}} hair {{$hairStyle.@hairStyleDesc}} and {{$eyeColor.@eyeColorDesc}} eyes. {{switch[$gender=="male":He].else[She]}} has {{$feature.@featureDesc}} {{$feature.@featureLocation}}, and is typically seen wearing {{$clothing.@clothingDesc}}.

templates.name: Personality Summary
templates.description: Generates a personality overview including traits, virtue, and flaw
templates.pattern: Fundamentally {{$primary}} and {{$secondary}}, {{$secondary.@secondaryBehavior}}. Their greatest strength is their {{$virtue.@virtueBehavior}}, but they struggle with {{$flaw}}, which manifests as {{$flaw.@flawBehavior}} especially when {{$flaw.@flawTrigger}}.

templates.name: Compact NPC
templates.description: A brief NPC summary for quick reference

templates.name: Complete NPC
templates.description: Full detailed NPC generation with all attributes exposed for reference

templates.name: Cultist NPC
templates.description: Generates an NPC specifically as a cultist or Mythos-connected antagonist

templates.name: Witness NPC
templates.description: Generates an NPC who has witnessed something strange
